content: Sam Lindley Sam Lindley Sam.Lindley@ed.ac.uk I am a Reader in Programming Language Design and Implementation in the Laboratory for Foundations of Computer Science at the School of Informatics at The University of Edinburgh. I hold a UKRI Future Leaders Fellowship in Effect Handler Oriented Programming. Papers See also DBLP and Google Scholar.
